freenet.client.events
Interface ClientEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientGet, ClientPut, ClientPutBase, ClientPutDir, EventDumper, EventLogger, FProxyFetchInProgress
public interface ClientEventListener

Event handling for clients.

Author:
oskar

Method Detail

receive

void receive(ClientEvent ce,
             com.db4o.ObjectContainer maybeContainer,
             ClientContext context)
Hears an event.

Parameters:
container - The database context the event was generated in. NOTE THAT IT MAY NOT HAVE BEEN GENERATED IN A DATABASE CONTEXT AT ALL: In this case, container will be null, and you should use context to schedule a DBJob.

onRemoveEventProducer

void onRemoveEventProducer(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container)
Called when the EventProducer gets removeFrom(ObjectContainer). If the listener is the main listener which probably called removeFrom(), it should do nothing. If it's a tag-along but request specific listener, it may need to remove itself.
